attributes.action: Reduce the cost of fuel for the consumers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is outrageous to think that in some parts of the UK people are paying over £1 a litre for petrol.  

Your government should be helping people to get about not reduce them to staying indoors.  There are many people out there who simply cannot afford the prices of fuel at the moment.  We are sure that the cost will continue to rise if we do not do something about it now!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
